definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
blessed by heaven (idiom)/enjoying exceptional advantages/favored by nature
Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union)/abbr. for 獨立國家聯合體|独立国家联合体
not alone but in pairs (idiom, usually derog.); not a unique occurrence/it's not the only case
to have a special fondness (for sth)

sentences.english: The winner of the ebook sweepstakes will be the booksellerwho becomes a bookrenter.
sentences.chinese: 獨得電子圖書賭金的贏家將是做圖書出租生意的書商。

sentences.english: A bridge alone, a person alone, it is demonstrating the quiet isolation.
sentences.chinese: 孤橋一座，獨人一個，表現出一種很冷清的場面。

sentences.english: I didnt wanna leave him alone.
Objiective To develop a method for the determination of Luteolin in Duyiwei Pellet.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立獨一味微丸中木犀草素含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: Ah, love, why dost thou let me wait outside at the door all alone?
sentences.chinese: 呵，愛，你爲什麼讓我獨在門外等候？

sentences.english: Majority of the committee members should be independent non-executive directors.
sentences.chinese: 委員會的大部份成員應爲獨立非執行董事。

sentences.english: Above a major heading , and one line clear below before.
sentences.chinese: 每個章節的標記與標題獨爲一行。

sentences.english: I don't mind scruffy, but a lady with a sense of what suits her.
sentences.chinese: 我不介意獨憔悴，但她中意的一位女士用更好的理解。

sentences.english: The designs of chiller and radiator and unique , so the heat exchange efficiency is very high.
sentences.chinese: 冷凝器及散熱器設計獨，換熱效果特佳。

sentences.english: Each section's marker and heading form one line .
sentences.chinese: 每個章節的標記與標題獨爲一行。

sentences.english: Innovation has virtually ceased. Microsoft dominates with very little innovation.
sentences.chinese: 創新停止，微軟獨大，沒有留下更多創新的空間。

sentences.english: Dumplings can be eaten either alone or in a soup.
sentences.chinese: 餃子可以獨喫或是和湯一起喫。

sentences.english: Walk with this incompatible man's tide alone.
sentences.chinese: 獨臫行走，與這格格不如的人羣。

sentences.english: In reality life, alone in the world of coexistence.
sentences.chinese: 真人淡泊無爲，獨於天地共存。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The method can be used for the quality control for Lamiophlomis rotata soft capsules.
sentences.chinese: 結論本方法可以用於獨一味軟膠囊的質量控制。

sentences.english: Their independence from great masters of the heart, display their energy.
sentences.chinese: 他們獨巨匠心，各顯其能。
